simple-tasks-task-duedate:
Label in a card which shows due date of a task.

Parameters:
* $1: due date
simple-tasks-notif-message:
Label for notification body which informs about assigned a task.

Parameters:
* $1 - agent
* $2 - task description
simple-tasks-taskreport-no-results: Label for tag if no task report results are found with selected filters
simple-tasks-taskreport-header-task: Label for grid column header which contains task description
simple-tasks-taskreport-header-assignee: Label for grid column header which contains username of assigned user
simple-tasks-taskreport-header-page: Label for grid column header which contains page name on which task is defined
simple-tasks-taskreport-header-due-to: Label for grid column header which contains due date of task
simple-tasks-taskreport-header-state: Label for grid column header which contains state of task
simple-tasks-droplet-taskreport-name: Label for card header which shows name of droplet according to tag task report
simple-tasks-droplet-taskreport-descript: Label for card body which shows description of droplet according to tag task report
simple-tasks-taskreport-inspector-label-: Label for input field to select assignees
Label for input field to select namespaces
Label for input field to select due date
Label for input field to select state of a task
simple-tasks-taskreport-state-filter-don: Label for status filter with value done
simple-tasks-taskreport-state-filter-ope: Label for status filter with value open
simple-tasks-echo-notification-task-emai:
Notification email body.
$1 - page title
$2 - agent
$3 - agent real name
$4 - task description
simple-tasks-echo-notification-task-web-:
Web notification body.
$1 - page title
$2 - agent
$3 - task description
